member.name: T:CimTools.V1.File.XmlFileManager
member.summary:
Persistent options are not saved inside the save file for a level, and persist regardless of the level that is loaded. These are good for saving options for a mod, which do not need to interact with elements within a certain level, or elements that can change between saved files.
All data stored in here is saved to the same folder as the game executable. This can be edited at any time by the user, and is not protected. It is stored as XML.
